text: geudaedeul-i gyeongbae uisig-eul jonglyohayeoss-eul ttaeneun geudaedeul-i josangdeul-eul tteoollineun geoscheoleom ani geuboda deo yeolsimhi hananim-eul tteoollila. salamdeul jung-eneun “jeohuiui junim-isiyeo, hyeonseeseo jeohuiege bepul-eo jusibsio” lago malhaneun jaga iss-euna naeseeseo geuegeneun geu eotteon mogsdo eobsnola
